If we are children of the light we should walk in the light as Christ is in the light, and testify before the world, before angels and men, that the truth has power to transform human character and to cause men to represent Christ. With David our testimony should be, "Thy gentleness hath made me great." Oh, that we might have divine perceptions, and be able to appreciate the holy, sacred efficiency of the truth which fell from the lips 


                                    -160- 

of Christ! Oh, that a permanent impression might be made upon the hearts of all!
